Moose::Autobox::Number(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Moose::Autobox::Number(3)

NAME

Moose::Autobox::Number - the Number role

DESCRIPTION

This is a role to describes a Numeric value.

METHODS

to
Takes another number as argument and produces an array ranging from the number the method is called on to the number given as argument. In some situations, this method intentionally behaves different from the range operator in perl: 

  $foo = [ 5 .. 1 ]; # $foo is []

  $foo = 5->to(1);   # $foo is [ 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 ]
meta

BUGS

All complex software has bugs lurking in it, and this module is no exception. If you find a bug please either email me, or add the bug to cpan-RT.
